What is the format of the "time" field in a transaction, and what does it represent?
The "time" field in a transaction represents the transaction time in milliseconds since the epoch (January 1, 1970 GMT), not in a custom format. The correct unit is seconds, not milliseconds.

ch (1 Jan 1970 GMT).
  "txid": "transactionid", (string) The transaction id. Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.
  "time": xxx,       (numeric) The transaction time in seconds since epoch (Jan 1 1970 GMT).
  "timereceived": xxx,   (numeric) The time received in seconds since epoch (Jan 1 1970 GMT). Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.
  "comment": "...",    (string) If a comment is associated with the transaction.
  "to": "...",      (string) If a comment to is associated with the transaction.
 ],
 "lastblock": "lastblockhash"   (string) The hash of the last block
}
